metadata.title: Chucheng Barking Control Device,Dog Barking Deterrent,Ultrasonic 3-in-1,3 Frequency Dog Training and Bark Control,Control Range of 16.4 Ft,with LED Light
features: [Dog Bark Control and Dog Training] - Our ultrasonic barking control devices provide a safe and effective solution for dog training and bark control. The anti bark device can effectively train your dogs to stop unwanted behaviors such as barking, digging, eating unsafe food, fighting, etc.

[Rechargeable Long Lasting Battery Life]- portable stop dog barking device is rechargeable300mah battery for up to 12 days of use without charging it again. And its standby time is up to 15 days in charging of 1-2 hours only! That makes this device an ideal option with its portable design perfect for anyone on the go!

[Ergonomic Design & Easy Carry for Indoor And Outdoor Use]- Lightweight and easy to carry around anywhere you need to use it, also fits comfortably into your pocket,which makes it perfect for indoor or outdoor use! Dog training and bark control devices use unique speakers that reach up to 16.4 ft, making it more convenient to train them to behave well in public. You can also carry the anti-barking control device around to drive dogs away.

[Correct unwanted behavior]- The ultrasonic dog barking deterrents emits an ultrasound of 25 KHZ, which will not affect humans but can grab dogs' attention with NO hurting. When the dog stops inappropriate behavior, please give the dog food, threats, or petting to reinforce the training's effect. The bark control device is not applicable for the following situations: aggressive dogs, hearing-impaired dogs, dogs under 6 months or over 8 years

[Better understanding between you and your dog]-- train your dog to behave properly with friendly devices such as Dog bark deterrent devices. Be patient while training your dog and remember to reward your friend with treats.
description: How to train your naughty puppy? When the dog has bad behaviours,you can use our ultrasonic training device to improve it,simply press and hold for 10s towards him (within 16.4ft), or switch to Variable Frequency (“Ⅱ”) when the dog doesn't respond to it. In order to achieve the desired results, once your dog accepts the ultrasonic bark controller correction and stops barking, you can give the pet appropriate rewards, such as snacks, petting, etc., to actively guide and strengthen the dog's memory. The dog will eventually learn to associate the barking with the ultrasound, forming a conditioned reflex and will stop barking this behavior. (Tips: Consistent training and appropriate rewards are required to achieve the desired result.) Important Notes: 1. The product may not be effective on dogs with hearing problems. 2. We DO NOT recommend it for use on dogs under 6 months or over 8 years and also the aggressive dogs. 3. Only training one dog with this device will be better. 4. In order to achieve long-lasting results, please be patient and consistently use the product as a training aid, along with commands and positive reinforcement.
